home.description: Fresh graduate student of Computer Science at Royal University of Phnom Penh

about.title: អំពីខ្ញុំ
about.description: I specialize in both frontend and backend technologies to create seamless, scalable web applications. With expertise in React, Next.js, Spring Boot, and Laravel, I build responsive user interfaces and robust backend systems, ensuring high performance, security, and maintainability throughout the entire application lifecycle.
about.frontendDescription: I build responsive, high-performance web applications with clean, maintainable code. Skilled in React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, WebSockets, and API integrations, I focus on crafting seamless user experiences and optimizing performance.
about.backendDescription: I develop scalable and efficient backend systems using Spring Boot and Laravel. Skilled in RESTful APIs, WebSockets, database management, and performance optimization, I focus on building secure and maintainable architectures.

project.title: ​គម្រោងដែលខ្ញុំបានបង្កើត

contact.title: ទំនាក់ទំនងខ្ញុំ
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to connect? Feel free to reach out! I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or simply chatting about tech.
